filter_type.description:
Indicates whether all the rows should apply to all filters (AND) or to any filter (OR).

* `AND` - And
* `OR` - Or

filters_disabled.description: Allows users to see results unfiltered while still keeping the filters saved for the view.

card_cover_image_field.description: References a file field of which the first image must be shown as card cover image.

public.description: Indicates whether the view is publicly accessible to visitors.

slug.description: The unique slug that can be used to construct a public URL.
